title: Obesity Solution Bicycle Project Fund
description: To fund expenses related to materials and testing/research needed to develop the prototype of a bicycle for obese riders.  Unspent funds at the end of the project will be absorbed by the Integrative Physiology Department discretionary fund.
marketingContent: To fund expenses related to materials and testing/research needed to develop the prototype of a bicycle for obese riders.  Unspent funds at the end of the project will be absorbed by the Integrative Physiology Department discretionary fund.
